00026 #include "Audio.hpp"

00028 namespace SilentMedia {
00029   namespace Audio {
00030     Audio::Audio() {
00031       // create SoundSystem instance
00032       soundSystem = SoundSystem::SoundSystem::Instance();
00033       // create AudioInfo instance
00034       audioInfo = AudioInfo::Instance();
00035 
00036       // Create a list of supported file formats
00037       supportedFormats.push_back("wav");
00038       supportedFormats.push_back("ogg");
00039       supportedFormats.push_back("flac");
00040       supportedFormats.push_back("wv");
00041 
00042       codecHashMap["ogg"] = new Codec::Vorbis();
00043     }
00044 
00045     Audio::~Audio() {
00046       delete soundSystem;
00047       soundSystem = NULL;
00048 
00049       delete audioInfo;
00050       audioInfo = NULL;
00051     }
00052 
00053     bool Audio::init(string driver) {
00054       std::cout << "in audio init" << std::endl;
00055       return (soundSystem -> init(driver));
00056       //    ao -> setParams(2, 44100, 16);
00057 
00058     }

00061       std::cout << "close audio system" << std::endl;
00062     }

00064     bool Audio::open(string fileName, string fileId) {
00065       std::cout << "open file name with id: " + fileId << std::endl;
00066 
00067       /*
00068        * Opening file contains with follow steps:
00069        * 1. We should check file extension (.ogg, .wav, .flac)
00070        * 2. Check if file extension equal one of supported file formats.
00071        * 3. (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) If this extension is missing, we should find
00072        * the type of file.
00073        * 4. If file extension not supported, exit.
00074        */
00075 
00076       fileExt = Utils::Func::getFileExtension(fileName);
00077       if (!checkSupportedFormat()) {
00078         cerr << "File extension \"" << fileExt << "\" is unsupported." << endl;
00079         return false;
00080       }
00081 
00082       //supportedFormats    //    Codec::Vorbis * v = new Codec::Vorbis();
00083       //      this -> codecMap["vorbis"] = new Codec::Vorbis();
00084       //      this -> codecMap["vorbis"] -> open(fileName, fileId);
00085       return true;
00086     }
00087 
00088     void Audio::play(string fileId) {
00089       std::cout << "play file name with id: " + fileId << std::endl;
00090 
00091       codecHashMap[fileExt] -> play(fileId);
00092     }

00115     bool Audio::checkSupportedFormat(void) {
00116       list < string >::iterator it;
00117       for (it = supportedFormats.begin(); it != supportedFormats.end(); ++it) {
00118         if (fileExt.compare(*it)) {
00119           return true;
00120         }
00121         return false;
00122       }
00123     }
00124   }
